remanence-of-love 157619517081 "2017-02-23 19:01:28 GMT" http://remanence-of-love.tumblr.com/post/157619517081/437-am-teared-eyes-dry-mouth "‚Äúi need to get over him ‚Ä®i need to get over this ‚Ä®im a strong‚Ä®i am. ‚Ä®but with him‚Ä®my brick wall simply corrupts into ashes‚Ä®with his shotgun words‚Ä®loving the sound of the trigger‚Ä®not noticing the damage it‚Äôs truly causing. everything is a mess ‚Ä®my wall is wounded with chips and cracks ‚Ä®some bricks have fallen to the ground ‚Ä®those who pass see the damage ‚Ä®they attempt to build me back up‚Ä®plastering me with words of encouragement ‚Ä®hammering me with truth ‚Ä®nailing so on so ‚Äòhelpful information‚Äô nothing helps. ‚Ä® those who are close ran out of plaster ‚Ä®ran out of nails‚Ä®all that is left is the truth‚Ä®the truth and silence ‚Ä®i sit here
column3: with nothing but the truth. ‚Ä®the truth‚Ä®most accept it ‚Ä®for i won‚Äôt ‚Ä®the truth is not of a friend ‚Ä®but a foe  yes‚Ä®what this boy is doing is causing damage ‚Ä®do i care‚Ä®no. ‚Ä®no matter his words or actions ‚Ä®i will always allow him to enter ‚Ä®enter my mind and thoughts ‚Ä®telling lies of love and hope ‚Ä®telling truth of sadness and past mistakes  this boy does not have a wall ‚Ä®what he has is a gate ‚Ä®spaces anyone can reach in‚Ä®to play with his mind
column4: tricking him of love‚Ä® this boy is damaged. ‚Ä®allowing a person to reach in and take his mind set. ‚Ä®and i tried to help. ‚Ä®all i had done was just jump over his fence ‚Ä®he allowed me to enter ‚Ä®enter his mind and thoughts‚Ä®telling lies of actions‚Ä®telling truth of love and hope of a future  i had gave him plaster‚Ä®to fix all the spaces he was missing ‚Ä®i plastered him ‚Ä®making him feel trapped and secluded‚Ä®i wanted him not to be hurt‚Ä®i noticed cracks and chips in the plaster ‚Ä®i asked and asked how this happened ‚Ä®what was wrong
column5: never telling me ‚Ä®that i‚Ä®myself ‚Ä®was the one creating this damage my walls broke
column6: falling and falling ‚Ä®pieces to pieces ‚Ä®bit by bit‚Ä®i had been destroyed of love  love is a scary thing ‚Ä®it is giving all your trust ‚Ä®all of your life ‚Ä®all of your energy ‚Ä®all of your dedication‚Ä®all‚Ä®to someone. ‚Ä®anyone who says they don‚Äôt want to be loved‚Ä®is so very wrong ‚Ä®everyone wants to be loved ‚Ä®but no one wants to be hurt from it.  think twice before falling. ‚Ä®falling is easy ‚Ä®but there‚Äôs only one way up. ‚Äù" True text

column1: remanence-of-love 157493412529 "2017-02-20 19:01:09 GMT" http://remanence-of-love.tumblr.com/post/157493412529/the-lovely-bones "He was the Ray to my Susie
column2: he‚Äôs tall with curly hair and a thick British accent. He made my insides feel like a roller coaster with his shy compliments and dashing smiles
column3: he gave me hope that there was something better.  He whispered sweet ‚ÄòI love you‚Äôs and kissed with a burning fire that made me melt into his big arms.  He gave me life
column4: and brought out a side of me I didn‚Äôt think existed.  He was the best part of me
column5: and now that he‚Äôs gone I‚Äôm left with all my terrible thoughts and my afternoon tears because he‚Äôs the one.  But he‚Äôs not mine anymore." True text

column1: remanence-of-love 157449214819 "2017-02-19 19:01:18 GMT" http://remanence-of-love.tumblr.com/post/157449214819/lost-love "I love how his eyes sparkled when he talked to me
column2: I love how his nose would crinkled when he smiled or laughed. I love how I could pick out each individual curl of his lovely long hair
column3: I love how gently he touched me and how he kissed each inch of my face hundreds of times. How he ran his fingers through my hair until I fell asleep
column4: and how he nuzzled into my hair and neck to smell my scent which comforted him when he was troubled.  It has been almost 2 years since he sent me that text. That damn text that broke me
column5: and that broke him. He was my happiness and I was his
column6: we know every detail of each others‚Äô body and mind like it‚Äôs our own. We are truly the perfect pair and are soul mates made to complete the other‚Äôs missing half.  I have the feeling of his lips on mine memorized
column7: I constantly remember what his hands felt like in mine and running across my skin and it makes me just want to run to him and just hold him one more time
column8: kiss his forehead one more time
column9: feel his hands caress my face. I‚Äôd do anything to be able to have him for myself again.  But we can‚Äôt be together anymore.  And now when I look at him from afar
column10: I see that his smile is not as big and bright as it once was
column11: his eyes no longer sparkle for they‚Äôve gone dull with heart ache and pain. His hair has grown to be a mess without me to tame it as has mine. My eyes no longer glisten with the look of love and my smile is no longer as pure and real. I am truly broken as is he
column12: and we both know it.  Whenever we are in the same room I feel him looking at me and I know he feels when I look at him. We have such a connection
column13: I can feel when he‚Äôs around even though I cannot see him
column14: and as soon as I see him we make eye contact and our hearts are once again shattered. I can pick out his sweet smell among thousands
column15: I can hear his voice in crowds of people
column16: I can taste his lips when eating our favorite food
column17: I hear his laugh when I listen to his favorite song.  We are meant to be
column18: but we have met at the wrong time and at the wrong place. Love has torn us apart and we are both truly broken from a love meant to be but that will never happen.  Maybe we shall meet again later in life
column19: in the right time and the right place. I would do whatever it takes to keep him here with me
column20: but there‚Äôs nothing I can do. So we shall have to figure out how to go on after being broken
column22: and how to love when all our love is gone." True text
